title: Rem3dy Health named partner for The Longevity Show 2026
summary: Personalized nutrition pioneer brings 3D-printed gummies and live demos to London as longevity moves from theory to everyday practice. Rem3dy Health has been named an official partner for The Longevity Show 2026 this June, marking another step in the steady migration of personalized nutrition from niche innovation to mainstream longevity discourse.
